title: AtoZ Sass
episode_subtitle: manipulate and tweak your colours with code
episode_summary: Colour is hugely important for adding life and visual interest to a project and is an invaluable tool for highlighting parts of the interface that a user can interact with.  In this practical episode we're going to talk all about manipulating colours programmatically with Sass.
